review_data.title: War super!!!
review_data.content: Küche war toll!!!!! Super Preisleistungsverhältniss! Bin sehr begeistert und komme gerne wieder!! Ich kann besonders die Nudeln mit Ente empfehlen!!!

review_data.title: Cheap and yummy lunch
review_data.content: Food I often come here over lunch for take away. I've tried various dishes from the lunch buffet, all very yummy. There are lots of different choices, also vegetarian. They have small and regular servings. The small is enough if you're not super hungry. A...More

review_data.title: A good lunch option near Wiedikon
review_data.content: Mai Wok is located less than one block from the Wiedikon train station. This place is a small Vietnamese restaurant with about seven tables and several sidewalk tables. They offer a nice variety of lunch specials with the selections from seafood, chicken, duck and beef....More

review_data.title: Charming, Clean, Friendly, Good!
review_data.content: Zurich has an over abundance of fast food Asian restaurants and I've eaten in many of them. Mai Wok is a true gem - authentic, wonderfully prepared fresh food, friendly service, and exceptionally clean! There is a small but varied selection of eat-in and take...More
